Blog.post: hello. How are you? I'm kinda upset. Just blaring my Evanescence music..... waiting for shannon to get her butt back on her computer bc I need to LEAVE SOON! *sighs* I hate myself... Hmm... Sometimes I wish I could just roll over and die in mym sleep... Life's to much hell for me... Hmmm... Well I'm gonna go. Byee! Ciao! ~Charm

..Ok right now i don't feel like talking so I'll just put up a bunch of quiz results I took on Quizilla. Oh yeah. If u like fanfiction... Go to urlLink http://www.fanfiction.net and check out my work. My pen name is Squid's*Charm THANKYOU! ^^ You are the biggest Evanescence fan! Your awesome! Send me a message! urlLink Are you a REAL Evanescence fan, or just pretending to be? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla You are Captain Jack Sparrow. You're fun loving, boisterous and a little full of yourself. You tend to look out for your own interests- although you have a compassionate side; you'll only help others if it benefits you as well. Rarely are you serious about anything. Like many people, you're just trying to be free. You also somehow manage to look masculine despite the fact that you wear mascara and move like a drag queen. urlLink Which Johnny Depp are You? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla Twitch ~ You think that little Twit is the cutest? Or did you just choose wrongly? Well, if you DID choose wrongly, I suggest you get out of here! If you didn't choose wrongly, I SO agree with you! ^_^ Isn't Twitch such so cute ?! urlLink Who's cutest to you? (*HOLES*) [for girls] brought to you by urlLink Quizilla You want to cuddle squid*-* Maybe its the fact of his badboy attitude...or maybe its the fact of him not knowing HOW to keep his mouth SHUT! Whatever the reason you want to hug this boy to death...have fun^-^ urlLink Which Boy from Disney's Holes would you cuddle? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla You're depressed. Really you are. And you definitely have a reason. You often space out and stare at things blankly, even if you're normally hyper and energetic. This is because nothing really seems important anymore. You might just be sad right now, or you might be manic depressive. Don't worry. Have some cocoa and stuff'll be ok. urlLink How Depressed are You? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla Dark magician. You love the dark because of it's beauty and just the life that no-one else sees. Mysterious, calm, quiet... But that doesn't mean you're not friendly! Please rate ^^ urlLink What kind of dark person are you? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla My Bloody Valentine by Good Charolette. you lost punker, but good unto you i liek that song and i bet you do too! if youve never heard it well then get out there and hear your own theme song!! urlLink What's Your Theme Song? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla ~Charm~

Could life be anymore duller? God I swear I hate it sometimes... Anyway I wish some people would stop mopping about their problems when all it's about is "OMG! My boyfriend broke up with me" and whine and cry over it... There are more important problems than that... God. Hmph. Most people don't know who has a real problem, mostly people care about only themselves. Like the MORONS they are. Stupid preps. Well anyway... If there's something that I totally love... That would have to be my favorite actors obsessions! lol. CHAD MICHAEL MURRAY IS A SEXXII BEAST! ^^ RIGHT SHANNON! HA! Well I gtg. ~Charm Congratulations, you're TOURNIQUET! Please send me a message! PS: Good Charlotte ROX! urlLink -x-Which Evanescence song are you?-x- brought to you by urlLink Quizilla

Life is something I didn't want at one point. Sometimes I still don't. I mean life for me is harder than it seems. Especially when I hide behind my smile. I'm a good liar with my charming smile... Very good. My heart breaks very easily and I care a lot about my friends since they are the only thing that keeps me going. The only people to keep me sane... My friends... I love them so... I am a cutter... I still cut every once and a while... out of pure urge but I'm trying to get help so far I'm doing quite well. I'm on the road to recovery. Which is a VERY good thing. I'm also an authoress on FanFiction.net... I write mostly Holes fics but I have one that is about the book Cut by Patricia McCormick which I might add is a wonderful book. And now I must go... I'll leave with a poem. Scream Don't give up I know it's tough. You hurting inside, Trying your best to survive. Don't give into the urge, Of that need to cut surge. Your not alone, Trust me I know. I've been right there where you are, I have more than one scar, Left upon my arm. You will be safe from harm. ~Charm~ "How will you know I am hurting if you cannot see my pain? To wear it on my body tells what words connot explain..."

Hello. Well my stupid bitch of a friend hasn't told me if I made chorale or not. I swear you can't trust anyone! I HATE THIS WORLD AND EVERYONE IN IT INCLUDING MYSELF! Well I just saw the Harry Potter 3 movie. *sighs* Well I should be going. I know this entry is short but I gotta go. I'll leave you with some more results from quizzes! ^.^ urlLink urlLink ...and which lesser Harry Potter character are you ? urlLink Which HP Kid Are You? I'm still waiting for my results over my status in chorale. . . No one's online. . . I'm pissed off. . . Life just frickin sucks! I HATE IT! I wish everyone would just die! I'm so upset and I wanna just die too! It's terrible. I'm even getting cutting thoughts which is NOT good. . . Not good at all. . . I'm so upset. . . My parents won't SHUT UP! I want them to die so much. . . along with my stupid brother. I feel like crying. . . so much right now. I feel so hated. We're watching the Weather Channel and they're showing this storm thing. Tornados are so cool to watch. They're so powerful and so destructive. Like me somewhat. I love the destruction. Muwaha. See this is why I'm called "evil" all the time. Maybe I should go back to church. heh. Wow! I'm in a good mood again! YAY! Squid: Freak. . . SHUT UP! Squid: MAKE ME! You're a weirdo. *glare* Well anyway. . . I gtg. I might post again today! haha. I'll crack up if I do. Byee! ~Charm

Hello! Well hopefully today I find out wether I made chorale or not. There's two choirs in my school and chorale's the better one. You hafta try out to get in it... I hope I made it. I wanna be in it sooooooo bad! And my stupid friend who's a frickin liar hasn't got on and told me. She's a stupid little bitch... *sighs* Hopefully I'll find out. Anyway. . . I'll leave you with some new results I got from quizzes. They SOOOOOO discribe me! Heh! I AM 67% TORTURED ARTIST!

Yusuke! You are basek off of Fire signs! GO YOU! urlLink Which Yu Yu Hakusho Character do you most relate to? Not obvious!! With descriptive results![with pics!] brought to you by urlLink Quizilla You are Slayd! A sweet half-human-half-demon, you only want to repent for your past, you act tough, but at heart your a softie! urlLink A Demon? ME?!...heh...YES!! brought to you by urlLink Quizilla Hiei loves you! thats ok I will share urlLink a dream date with Hiei Jaganshi for girls obviously brought to you by urlLink Quizilla Hiei is your destiny, you trust him with your life soul body and mind and would never betray him. Part two finished! Part 3 almost done! Rate me I'm just an 11 year old MD Crab-eating girl with a turkey-crazed teacher stalking psycopath as a best friend! urlLink A Romantic Date With Hiei (More Realistic) Part 1 ~I FIXED IT IM SORRY IT MESSED UP BEFORE I HAVE A SHITTY COMPUTER~ brought to you by urlLink Quizilla You are a hot Quidditch player! Wow! With lightning reflexes, cool manouvers, and spectacular saves, you are one of the most agile players on the pitch. So popular you have fans screaming in the stands, you have a love for the limelight that's almost as strong as your fiery talent and need for speed. urlLink A Harry Potter quiz: How good at Quidditch would you be? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla Trunks Loves you in every way and form and would never let go of you if possible. He wants you and can't help but feel that way! Yay You! urlLink Your First Meeting With Trunks brought to you by urlLink Quizilla I AM 60% GOTH!

AHHH! I'm being sexually harrassed by guys online! I swear guys are gross people! EW! The guy is just ick! Do you think I really wanna have sex online? That's kinda wrong in my world. Maybe not to someone else but to me it IS wrong. I mean isn't sex supposed to be with someone you love? I mean duh! Well i'm on this site www.taborama.com urlLink and my name is 4darkened_skies7 and this guy will not shut up! Dammit! I'll shoot him or something! Dammit. Well anyway. . . I updated one of my stories on fanfiction.net and I changed my pen name a long time ago if you realized you couldn't find me. lol. It's xxTwitchyxCharmxx now. ok. well I gtg and tell this guy to fuck off before he gets a bloody nose. lol ByeE ~Charm

Hello again. Well I'm blaring Three days grace on my computer as I write this entry. I love having this blog. It really helps me get out my problems. I love my new template too. Blackness and darkness, just like my soul. Anyway. I'm listing "Just Like You" by Three Days Grace. GREAT SONG! LISTEN TO IT! It's very awesome. I love those guys. They're great. THey help me with my anger issues. My favorite though is "Home". That song is like practically my theme. And now "Home" just came on! YES! WOO! *runs around cheering* Well I should be updating my stories on fanfiction.net but I'm low on ideas... Well actually I'm just lazy lol. Well I should be going but... I don't wanna. Harry Potter 3 comes out in theaters tomorrow and I only have 3 more days of school left. omg. HAHA "Three days" and "three days" grace HAHAHA! *cracks up* That was funny! Anyway... I'm gonna go! BYE! ~Charm Home I'll be coming home Just to be alone Cause I know you're not there And I know that you don't care I can hardly wait to leave this place No matter how hard I try You're never satisfied This is not a home I think I'm better off alone You always disappear Even when you're here This is not my home I think I'm better off alone Home, this house is not a home By the time you come home I'm already stoned You turn off the tv And you scream at me I can hardly wait until you get off my case No matter how hard I try You're never satisfied This is not a home I think I'm better off alone You always disappear Even when you're here This is not my home I think I'm better off alone Home, this house is not a home This house is not a home I'm better off alone No matter how hard I try You're never satisfied This is not a home I think I'm better off alone You always disappear Even when you're here This is not my home I think I'm better off alone Home, this house is not a home

Well HELLO! Thought I had forgotten about you didn't you!? NOPE! I've just really busy. Like depression over taking me and this fucking stupid camp I had to go to. Well I'm bored this day. I just saw Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story, which is fricking funny! I never laughed so much. Even these old ladies were cracking up at the VERY VERY VERY crude humor that was inovled in this film. BUT IT WAS FUNNY AND THAT'S ALL THAT MATTERS! Whew. I'm hyper. Well I must be off... I'm bored and kinda upset now... Damn...
